attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-user
attributes.description: Whether or not the current user should be shown in dropdown (and therefore whether or not user management popups should be available when authentication is active)

attributes.name: data-tchmi-allow-logout
attributes.description: Whether or not the logout button is displayed (requires active authentication)

attributes.name: data-tchmi-allow-switch-user
attributes.description: Whether or not the switch user button is displayed in the user management popup

attributes.name: data-tchmi-mobile-view-width
attributes.description: A display width lower this width activates the smartphone view.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-monitor-view-width
attributes.description: A display width larger this width activates the monitor view

attributes.name: data-tchmi-drop-down-username-font-size
attributes.description: The size of the username font.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-drop-down-username-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative sizing '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-drop-down-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative sizing '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-switch-tooltip-alias
attributes.defaultValue: Show advanced users/groups (e.g. __SystemAdministrator/__SystemUsers) in the selection combobox.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: Show advanced users/groups (e.g. __SystemAdministrator/__SystemUsers) in the selection combobox.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-repeat-new-password-placeholder-alias
attributes.description: Repeat New Password Placeholder alias name

attributes.name: data-tchmi-activate-authentication-alias
attributes.defaultValue: Please activate authentication to save your configuration.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: Please activate authentication to save your configuration.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-activate-authentication-user-management-alias
attributes.description: Activate Authentication User Management alias name
attributes.defaultValue: Please activate authentication to use user management.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: Please activate authentication to use user management.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-feedback-usergroup-alias
attributes.defaultValue: Please select one or more user groups.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: Please select one or more user groups.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-feedback-no-usergroup-alias
attributes.defaultValue: There are no user groups to select. Please create user groups first.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: There are no user groups to select. Please create user groups first.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-feedback-nothing-to-configure-alias
attributes.description: Feedback Nothing to Configure alias name
attributes.defaultValue: Nothing to configure. Please select another domain.
attributes.defaultValueInternal: Nothing to configure. Please select another domain.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-reset
attributes.description: Reset of analytics module data (bind to reset variable).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-hover-font-color
attributes.description: Color of the font when dropdown is hovered

attributes.name: data-tchmi-control-color-middle
attributes.description: Color of the dropdown when hovered

attributes.name: data-tchmi-color-gradient
attributes.description: Color Gradient in percent for colors in the control.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-font-size-title
attributes.description: Specifies the fontsize of the title in pixel

attributes.name: data-tchmi-default-control-distance
attributes.description: Default Grid Gap in referenced Layout Manager Controls

attributes.name: data-tchmi-column-number
attributes.description: Number of columns in referenced Layout Manager Controls

attributes.name: data-tchmi-navigation-bar-control-symbol
attributes.description: Optional navigation control to handle user permissions.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-permissions-source-manager-alias
attributes.description: Alias for the Data Source Management

events.name: .onSettingsClick
events.description: The settingsclick event is fired when a pointing device (usally a mouse) clicks the settings button

events.name: .onEventviewClick
events.description: The eventviewclick event is fired when a pointing device (usally a mouse) clicks the eventview button

events.name: .onViewSwitched
events.description: the onviewswitched event is fired if the view switched to mobile, tablet or desktop view.
